attributes.action: I want the government to ban homework
attributes.additional_details: ban homework so kids are happier and have more time to do more activitys
attributes.background:
I want the children of this country to be less stressed about getting 
 detention or isolation as high schools like to call it. This will make children happier and have more free time to do extra activities

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban homework except for GCSE coursework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387

Ban homework in schools apart from core/GCSE subjects: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634817

Ban primary schools from setting homework: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
